content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it, but I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed. What is your budget for renting an apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is x Euros. Can you give me the price of the apartment?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Hassan. The apartment I have available is 25 square meters and is located in a central area of Munich. Based on market rates, I am looking to rent it for €500 per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, that is within my budget. I agree to the price of 500 Euros.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Excellent, Hassan. I am glad to hear that you agree to the price of €500 per month for the apartment. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before we proceed with the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
